name: Reptilianne Coatl
effectText: If you control a DARK Reptile monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then, if your opponent controls any monsters with 0 ATK, you can Special Summon up to an equal number of "Reptilianne" monsters from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Reptilianne Coatl" once per turn. If this card you control would be used as Synchro Material for a Reptile monster, you can treat it as a non-Tuner.
